misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the younger brother of Pasi, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing his home club, Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. Known for his calm demeanor on the course, Eero is a formidable competitor. Spectators often remark on his ability to remain unfazed under pressure, a skill he has honed through dedicated mental fortitude training.

Having participated in 7 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Eero is looking forward to the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, which marks his eighth appearance in the prestigious event. While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero has demonstrated his individual prowess by clinching the Victor Trophy once, a testament to his skill and determination.
Eero remains an active and respected participant in Hector events, embodying the spirit of the competition with his sportsmanship and dedication.
